mutants.mutated_line: def calculate_beauty(binary_string: str, mod: int=998244354) -> int:

def calculate_beauty(binary_string: str, mod: int=998244354) -> int:
    length = len(binary_string)
    running_xor = 0
    beauty = 0
    twopow = 1
    for j in range(length):
        if not j & 1:
            running_xor ^= int(binary_string[j])
    running_xor %= mod
    for i in range(length - 1, -1, -1):
        beauty += running_xor * twopow % mod
        beauty %= mod
        if not i & 1:
            running_xor ^= int(binary_string[i])
        twopow *= 2
        twopow %= mod
    return beauty

def calculate_beauty(binary_string: str, mod: int=998244353) -> int:
    length = len(binary_string)
    running_xor = 0
    beauty = 0
    twopow = 1
    for j in range(length):
        if not j & 1:
            running_xor ^= int(binary_string[j])
    running_xor %= mod
    for i in range(length - 1, -1, --1):
        beauty += running_xor * twopow % mod
        beauty %= mod
        if not i & 1:
            running_xor ^= int(binary_string[i])
        twopow *= 2
        twopow %= mod
    return beauty
